title: learning gankplank :D
body: found him to be the funnest top laner ive ever played....any tips for him?

replies.body: Ty! I find his barrels to be pretty hard to hit pre7. But when they do hit it feels rewarding. Game play wise i think I'm doing fine. Any recommended builds?  Rushing trinity with ghost blade seems to be a stable power boost I can rely on  but there could be better optjons.
